name: Reavers of New Rome [Demo]
description:
NOTE: This is an early alpha demo. Many things will change by the time the game is finished.

Reavers of New Rome is part of Inedible Pulp Vol. 1. You can Support it on Kickstarter!

Over a century ago, your ancestors were Senators of New Rome. However, when the Emperor took over, they were exiled. Under the reign of Caligula-Reincarnated-As-Caligula, the city of New Rome has grown decadent. Though your great-great-grand-parents left New Rome as Senators, you now arrive upon its shore as a Barbarian at the Gates.

Reavers of New Rome is a 3D action-adventure game with lock-on combat.

This demo contains the first area of the game, taking you from the docks of the port of New Rome, through the ruins of a fishing village, and up to the gates of New Rome.

Controls

WASD - Move

Mouse - Look Around

Shift - Lock-On

LMB - Shoot

RMB - Charge melee attack

Space - Roll

Esc - Pause

M - Mute
